name: Tuscan Bean, Chicken, and Italian Sausage Soup
author: DomesticGoddess
summary: Tasty Italian soup that's quick and easy to make.
ingredients: ¾ pound Italian chicken sausage links, casings removed and sausages cut into 1/4-inch pieces
2 (15 ounce) cans white beans, drained and rinsed
directions: Cook sausage in a large pot over medium-high heat until cooked through and completely browned, 5 to 7 minutes
Cook and stir onion with the sausage until translucent, about 5 minutes
Add squash and garlic; cook and stir until the garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute more
Pour chicken broth, white beans, and diced tomatoes into the pot; stir
Add spinach, red wine, and Italian seasoning; bring the mixture to a simmer and cook until hot, about 15 minutes
Ladle soup into bowls and garnish with Pecorino-Romano cheese to serve
